description: Cybercriminals targeting Euro 2024 fans & organizers! Phishing scams, illegal content sites, malware-laced apps & ticket fraud threaten the game. Learn how to protect yourself & ensure a safe Euro 2024 experience.
title: Thousands of UEFA Customer Credentials Sold on Dark Web

description: A trusted JavaScript library, Polyfill.io, became a malware delivery system. Security experts exposed the attack and the potential consequences for website visitors. Learn how this supply chain attack highlights the importance of web development security and what steps developers can take to protect users.
title: Polyfill Library Injected with Malware Impacting 100,000 Websites

description: Discover the Fediverse, a decentralized social media network promoting interoperability, privacy, and customization. Explore its pros, cons, platforms like Mastodon and PeerTube, and the role of decentralization. A game-changer in online communication and community-building.
title: What is the Fediverse and the Social Network Platforms It Powers
Infinidat Introduces Cyber Storage Protection to Reduce Ransomware and Malware Threats
Infinidat Revolutionizes Enterprise Cyber Storage Protection to Reduce Ransomware and Malware Threat Windows
